1.text: Immerse your jewelry in white vinegar.

2.text: Add baking soda for a deeper clean.
2.vid: /7/74/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 2 Version 4.360p.mp4

3.text: Use vinegar, tea tree oil and baking soda.
3.vid: /e/e3/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 3 Version 4.360p.mp4

4.text: Scrub the jewlery with baking soda.
4.vid: /4/45/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 4 Version 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Line a shallow pan with aluminum foil.

6.text: Add boiling water, baking soda and salt to the pan.
6.vid: /1/18/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 6 Version 4.360p.mp4

7.text: Add the vinegar to the pan.
7.vid: /b/bc/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 7 Version 4.360p.mp4

9.vid: /1/19/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 9 Version 4.360p.mp4

10.text: Use distilled water in your vinegar pickle.

12.vid: /4/43/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 12 Version 4.360p.mp4

13.vid: /3/36/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 13 Version 4.360p.mp4

14.vid: /0/03/Clean Silver Jewelry with Vinegar Step 14 Version 4.360p.mp4
